Title: Miami Supercops
Writer: Bruno Corbucci, Luciano Vincenzoni (story and screenplay)
Actors: Terence Hill, Bud Spencer, C.B. Seay, William 'Bo' Jim
Plot: Garret goes to Miami and gets murdered after 7 years in prison for a $20,000,000 bank robbery. The money and the 2 others were never found. The Trinity bros. go to Miami as cops to solve the case this time. Fun fights.
